definition: Rubin (name)/Robert E. Rubin (1938-), US Treasury Secretary 1995-1999 under President Clinton
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: Rubins bet earned Goldman many multiples of Blacks salary.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾的豪赌为高盛带来的收入是布莱克薪水的好几倍。

sentences.english: "We are all doing the right thing," Rubin says.
sentences.chinese: “我们都在做正确的事情，”鲁宾说。

sentences.english: Rubin claims the gizmo can even improve your sex life.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾说这个小发明甚至能提高你的性生活。

sentences.english: My father is happy to have a son-in-law such as Robin.
sentences.chinese: 父亲对鲁宾这样的女婿还是比较满意的。

sentences.english: The Robinsons will be staying with us again this year.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾逊一家人今年将再次和我们住在一起。

sentences.english: During the interview, Rubenstein touched on a wide range of topics.
sentences.chinese: 在采访期间，鲁宾斯坦谈到了一系列广泛的话题。

sentences.english: “The industry is repeating itself,” Rubin says.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾说:“行业正在重复着它本身”。

sentences.english: "Robinson Crusoe" took me into a strange world full of danger.
sentences.chinese: “鲁宾逊漂流记”带我到一个陌生的世界充满了危险。

sentences.english: That spiritual practice begins with what Robinson calls a "theology of self-culture."
sentences.chinese: 这种修行以鲁宾逊称作“自我修养神学”开始。

sentences.english: Rubin, like most engineers, is usually soft-spoken.
sentences.chinese: 和大多数工程师一样，鲁宾通常轻声细语。

sentences.english: Like those who follow Robinson, rather than drifting gold a iron axes useful.
sentences.chinese: 好像那些随鲁宾孙漂流的金币，远不如一把铁斧有用。

sentences.english: May 31, 2011 Tuesday, sunny day I saw a piece of Robinson Crusoe story.
sentences.chinese: 今天我看了鲁宾逊漂流记的一片故事。

sentences.english: I wanted to buy a book Robinson Crusoe.
sentences.chinese: 我想买一本《鲁宾逊漂流记》。

sentences.english: Rubin is a pretty sharp guy.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾是一个非常犀利的家伙。

sentences.english: He bought a Rubens and flipped it at a markup.
sentences.chinese: 他购买了一幅鲁宾斯的作品，然后转手加价。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
Schiller (name)/Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller or Friedrich Schiller (1759-1805), German poet and dramatist
Bern or Berne, capital of Switzerland (Tw)
